text.title: Build a Better Relationship with Your New Stepchild
text.head: Build a Better Relationship with Your New Stepchild
text.p: So you just got married . That 's great ! If your new spouse has children already then you ’re also a new stepparent . Stepchildren can be a blessing and a curse depending on your relationship , and if you ’re reading this article , you probably feel it ’s a curse . It may seem difficult now , but with help and time , you may start to get along . Read this article to start the journey of building a better relationship with your new stepchild .
text.head: Steps

list.item: Think of why he may be acting the way that he is . Is he uncomfortable with the relationship ? Perhaps you said something to him that he took the wrong way ? Did you marry his mother right after causing the death of his father ? These are all good questions to ask yourself in trying to assess your relationship and understand your new step son .

Since you are new to the child , let them set the pace of the relationship . Younger children may be quicker to bond with you , while older children may be more reluctant to get close . Do n’t force them to become close to you , as you cannot force trust or love . Remember that you are not their real parent and that they will still feel devoted to the biological parent that you have replaced . They may also only listen to your spouse before warming up to you . Do not begin calling them “ son ” or “ daughter . ” Let the relationship grow before jumping into that .

Do be strong in the household , whether they listen to you or not . Make sure the stepchild knows that they are to respect you and are not free to do whatever they please . Your spouse should have your back and do their best to encourage the child to cooperate . Enforce the rules . If they do not listen to you , let them suffer the consequences . Appropriate punishments would be grounding them or not letting them do a fun thing . Plotting to kill your stepchild may be too much .

Do n’t let your new stepchild feel rejected by you . How you act towards them will seem amplified . If you get angry , it will feel stronger than what they receive from their parents . Make sure that your stepchild understand why you ’re angry with them . Ask them questions to make them feel heard and understood . Children do n’t like to feel unloved , and they are quick to feel rejected . How you treat them in the beginning can have a huge impact on your future relationship .

text.head: Tips

list.item: Always consider the perspective of the stepchild
Do n't be too strict , or too much of a pushover

text.head: Warnings

list.item: Plotting to kill your stepchild will result in chaos .
Do not employ his/her friends as spies . This leads to distrust .
